comment: Taken Fall 2016. Dr. Brown is one of a kind, truly if all teacher were as smart and organized as he is, all students would be successful.  All of the homework is self-paced, there are due dates, and there is one midterm paper.   The book is not required, but I like to have a physical copy rather than digital.   You will not be disappointed with him.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Get ready to read

comment: Mostly one weekly short essay question and discussion questions-lots of participation.  I thought he was between the usual and an easy A.  Rubrics are concise and material is light.  One paper- very important to your grade. Lots of interaction with other students (online class) no group projects.  Interesting subject.
Oh my god easy A across the board. Do the post, answer other peoples post, and quizzes each week are so easy. Do this for a GPA booster

Easiest class ever! There is a  quiz, 5 small discussion posts, a larger short essay question, and 2 peer responses due every week. You can easily do everything for the week in a couple of hours and if you keep up with it its a very easy A. I finished the class with a 100!

Awesome teacher!!!! 10 weeks long; 5 discussions every week, have to reply to 2 people discussion every week to receive participation points, 1 section discussion every week, & only 10 quizzes. Very easy class responses only have to be 2 sentences long, all the assignments are due on the last week of class so you have time. He answers all your ques

This class is super easy! He is a easy grader. You have the entire semester to do the work and still get credit for it, just takes off participation points. Easiest class Ive taken. Wish he taught more!

This class was SO easy! All you have to do are discussions posts, that don't have to make sense or even be grammatically correct. DO NOT BUY THE BOOK. You don't need it to answer discussion questions like "How do you feel about marijuana?" Seriously, those are the questions. Easiest A ever. Good for GenEd, but if you like soci take a real class.

This class is an easy A. It was online and only ten weeks long. All you have to do is familiarize yourself with the topic and post educated responses. To be honest, I did not buy the book. I used free online resources to learn the information.

Wasn't expecting much from this class, but it was very interesting! Every week there are 5 short (1-2 sentence) response questions and 1 short essay question. If you miss a few, you can go back and complete them throughout entire semester. (You'll just miss out on the participation points.) Research paper and steps make up rest of grade. Take him!
Boring, boring, boring. This teacher completely calls it in. Not in any way engaging. An easy A if you just do the work, but it is a shame that this is considered college level.

No tests but quite a bit of reading. Read the syllabus and rubric. An 'A' is easily attainable if you read the assigned chapter, post your responses to the weekly questionsshort essay, and respond to other students postings on time.
Easiest class i've ever taken. 5 discussion questions and 1 short answer question each week. No test or quizzes. Its a lot of writing but as long as you do it, it's an easy 100. Take him!!

Soci of occupations was a great class! It was so interesting. I wasnt expecting much before taking it, but I am glad I did. The material was interesting. I actually enjoyed doing the research paper. It was an easy class as well. Easy to pace. I would take him again in a heartbeat!

Easy A! Just do the assignments; nothing has a due date except, to reply to two people per week on their postings.One 5 page paper; you chose a topic that goes with the material. No tests. Quizzes are also very easy but a little more work and thought. The only feedback you get is from classmates that's the downside. Everything is your opinion.
Dr. Brown was really cool and made it were there were some really interesting discussions. Took this class online and as long as you check in and do the work every week you will pass with an A.
Super easy. Just make sure you participate on time, the other stuff can be done until the end of the semester. No tests. Just quizes, that are opinion based.
I took his class online. He is extremely easy!Don't need to buy the textbook. You will get an A. Just keep up with your work.

I feel like I did nothing in this class but blog. You make a weekly post about a topic, you don't need your book just an opinion. "Quizzes" are just the same thing but you turn them into him. Do the work and you'll get a 100 in the class, I don't think he takes points off for anything because he accepts late grades too. Super easy A.

Hands down easy A if you read and answer the weekly questions.Plenty of Reading and one research paper required.He will respond to your emails quickly and give plenty of chances to make up work. Only way to fail is by not doing the weekly assignments.
Promptly responds to questions.  You will be absolutely fine as long as you answer the questions.
BEST CLASS I HAVE TAKEN IN THE HISTORY OF MY COLLEGE EXPERIENCE!

Quite simply, if you fail this class it is completely your fault. I didn't even read the textbook and got an A in this class. Every week you do 5 lecture questions and a discussion question plus respond to your classmates. It's really that simple.

Took the online course and it was so boring. Easy A however so if that is all you care about then go ahead and take him. I'm sure the online version is easier than taking it in a class just don't skip out on the work he doesn't take stuff late.
Course is clear from the start. Easy 100. Just FOLLOW THE SYLLABUS. Do your DQ's, lecture questions, and do your participation!!

I took this class online. The professor makes his expectations clear on first day. Do the LQ and DQ each week on time with the correct amount of characters and you will do well. No test but I would recommend reading the chapter so you can answer the questions with knowledge and not opinion.

I highly, highly recommend that you take it during a heavy and/or hectic semester! It's very straightforward and easy, takes up little time, and there's basically no stress. Definitely a class where the more you put in, the more you get out.

Easy A. No joke. No tests...Just the paper and online discussions questions due every week. This class was online and used for my CJ upper division studies. He responded to our questions when we needed and was a good professor. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! (Toward the end of the sem, questions come from the text.)
One word EASY A!! For this class to be online, it wasn't hard at all. Just complete all the work and you want have anything to worry about. Lots of writing!

Had to write my life away on the discussion boards. Other than that easy A, no test no final. All you do is write discussion comments  for 6 topics a weeks due sunday... if you need an EASY A TAKE THIS. =)
Had to write my life away on the discussion boards.. Other than that very easy class no test Just writing =)... if u need an easy A this is a class to take.

Do what the syllabus tells you to do, and you'll make an A. If there's any confusion, he's really quick to respond to questions posted on the discussion board. I think I used the book once or twice, but most of the questions are based on your own experience and views.

Easiest A ever. 5 Lecture questions every week (Opinion), Then you respond to two other Lecture Questions (Opinion). (No minimum length) Then you have a Discussion Question minimum 1600 characters (Based on prior experience or the article he posts)  Do not buy the book, I never used it.No Final. No tests, all Lecture Discussion Questions.
If you want a good grade, take this prof. Its the easiest A you will ever get!!!

I took this class online and really enjoyed it.  As long as you do the weekly assignments you will do fine.  Everything is listed on the syllabus, just do it and you will make an A. Dr. Brown is great in responding if you need him.

This class is the bomb!!! I took it online and got an A! if you just do the lecture and discussion questions, you will pass easily. What you make in this class depends if you did any of the questions. Overall, If you want an easy A, take this class!
I would recommend taking his class.  It is one of the easiest classes you'll ever take.  Just make sure you stay on top of your weekly posts and you'll do fine!
I loved this online class. I ended up with a perfect A. Just do what the syllabus asks for and you'll do great. This teacher and course is GREAT!

You get out of this class what you put into this class.  One poster said they didn't even open the book and passed.  He did himself an injustice by not putting his potential into the class.  Dr. Brown allows you the freedom to learn a lot if you take the class seriously and do what is asked of you as a student.

I took this class online and it was SO EASY! There are 2 WebCT forums: 40 Lecture Questions based on the text and 8 Discussion Questions based on Galileo articles, which have a minimum length of 1600 characters. These are your only grades (besides responding to 2 peers). No tests, essays, or final! I didn't open the book and made a perfect score :)
I took the course online. THis class is weekly discussions. The questions are pretty easy, just think a little bit and answer the question, and you should ace the class.

This is an online class,its amazing.Basically,You have to make 4 small discussion posts a week and one fairly large one (about 3/4 page) It takes like 20 minutes a week! You also have to make a reply to 2 other students postings, but they have no min. word #.Thats it.Thats your grade. If you can spend 20min/week on posts, you will get an A. PERIOD!
